name: Flotation Machine
overview: Flotation machine is indispensable machine in many mineral dressing plants. Agitator flotation machine, pneumatic flotation machine and pneumatic- agitator flotation machine are produced for differents projects.
feature: Large air-absorption capacity and low energy consumption
application: Flotation machine are mainly used in mineral ore dressing plants. It is applicable for the separation of numerous of mineral ores, such as fluorite and talc, gold ore, copper ore, iron ore and zinc ore, etc.
